result.execSummary:
The defendant Nina C Llanas was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time.
Concurrent with: Count 3, if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Restitution is to be paid as a Condition of Probation within the first 6 months of probation and to be paid BEFORE costs/fines.
Court costs and DNA surcharge are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No contact with Toon City or Michael H.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time.
Concurrent with: Count 1, if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Court costs are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.
Same Conditions for Probation apply to as to Count 1.

records.addlTxt: filed by the state
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Nina C Llanas in court with Attorney Peter M Wolff.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Barry Braatz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enteres a guilty plea to Counts #1 & 3.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Counts #1 & 3.  Counts #2 & 4 are dismissed and read-in.  Victim/witness  Michael H. makes statements.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Wolff make statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

150 DAYS JAIL STRAIGHT TIME     **CONCURRENT WITH COUNT #3**

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
____No Use or Possession of alcohol or illegal drugs 
____No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: Toon City or with Michael H.

RESTITUTION:  $396.00 to Michael H.  (to be paid within 1st 6 months of probation- restitution to be paid before costs or fines)

COSTS:  $243.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid as a condition of probation)

**Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.**


COUNT #3:  IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

30 DAYS JAIL STRAIGHT TIME     **CONCURRENT WITH COUNT #1**

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
____No Use or Possession of alcohol or illegal drugs 
____No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: Toon City or with Michael H.


COSTS:  $243.00  (to be paid as a condition of probation)
